name: bekind_playground
description: BeKind_Playground for prototypes and maybe production build.

hooks.pre-commit: cd s_backend/s_b_core/ && yarn start prettier && echo '## BACKEND DONE ##' && cd ../../s_frontend/s_web/ && yarn start prettier && echo '## WEB DONE ##' && cd ../s_mobile/ && yarn start prettier && echo '## MOBILE DONE '
